name: Psymon
tagline: A cross-platform, task and performance monitor
body:
### Python System Monitor
**[Downloads](https://github.com/ftso/psymon/releases)**
**Fearures:** * Global processes monitoring * System load history (cpu,memory,network and disks) * Disks informations * Network connections * Detailed informations and cpu, memory percentage history per process

**Screenshots:** ![Screenshots3](http://dl.dropbox.com/u/1320617/myblog/posts/psymon_network.jpeg)
![Screenshots1](http://dl.dropbox.com/u/1320617/myblog/posts/psymon_processtable.jpeg)
![Screenshots2](http://dl.dropbox.com/u/1320617/myblog/posts/psymon_cpu_mem.jpeg)
![Screenshots4](http://dl.dropbox.com/u/1320617/myblog/posts/psymon_procdetails.jpeg)
